snippet: After sponsoring No Mothers Day last year to raise awareness about maternal deaths, the model Christy Turlington Burns is urging people to celebrate Know Mothers Day.
abstract: Every Mother Counts, charity begun by maternal-health advocate Christy Turlington Burns to raise awareness about maternal deaths, is asking participants to use social media to describe what they value about their mothers in honor of Mother's Day; Burns began charity to help mothers in poor countries after she herself nearly died in childbirth.
lead_paragraph: After sponsoring No Mothers Day last year to raise awareness about maternal deaths, the model Christy Turlington Burns is urging people to celebrate Know Mothers Day.
